# Problem 1

### Loading the p8105_mtp_data.xlsx data set and cleaning the data set 
```{r}
naturer_df <-
  read_excel(
    "./data/p8105_mtp_data.xlsx",
    sheet = "this one",
    range = "A9:I1230") %>%
  janitor::clean_names()
```


### replacing numerical codes with actual data information
```{r}
naturer_dfc <- 
  naturer_df %>%
  mutate(
    sex = recode(sex, "0" = "Female", "1" = "Male"),
    age_group = recode(age_group,
                       "2" = "18-30", 
                       "3" = "31-40", 
                       "4" = "41-50",
                       "5" = "51-60", 
                       "6" = "60+",
                       "7" = "60+", 
                       "8" = "60+")
    )

naturer_dfc
```
